10 def set_new_pos(req):
11  print("Target reached! Please insert a new position")
12  x = float(raw_input('x :'))
13  y = float(raw_input('y :'))
14  rospy.set_param("des_pos_x", x)

20 def main():

23  x = rospy.get_param("des_pos_x")
24  y = rospy.get_param("des_pos_y")
25  print("Hi! We are reaching the first position: x = " +
